description:
Enable Drag-and-Drop Rearrangement for People Cards and Configurable Connection Lines

Implement interactive repositioning of people cards and add visual customization options for connection lines between cards to match standard mind mapping functionality.

Requirements:

Draggable People Cards:
- Enable drag-and-drop functionality for all people cards on the canvas
- Maintain card positions persistently after rearrangement
- Update connection lines dynamically as cards are moved
- Provide visual feedback during drag operations (cursor change, card elevation/shadow)
- Prevent cards from overlapping or provide collision handling
- Support smooth animation when releasing cards into new positions
- Ensure touch device compatibility for drag operations

Configurable Connection Lines:
- Add a setting to toggle between line styles: straight lines, right-angled (orthogonal) lines, and curved (bezier) lines
- Store user's preferred connection line style
- Apply the selected style consistently to all card connections
- Ensure connection lines automatically reroute when cards are moved
- Maintain connection endpoints anchored to appropriate card edges
- Update all existing connections when style is changed

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Moving cards near canvas boundaries
- Dragging cards with multiple connections
- Performance with large numbers of cards and connections
- Undo/redo support for card repositioning
- Keyboard accessibility for moving cards
- Connection line routing around other cards (for orthogonal lines)
- Ensure cards to not open to details after dragging
title: Add draggable people cards with configurable connection lines
